metadata.title: CVE-2024-57636 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An issue in the itc_sample_row_check component of openlinkvirtuoso-opensource v7.2.11 allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service(DoS) via crafted SQL statements.

criterions.comment: virtuoso-opensource package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
